title: Sangeetha Jaadthi Mullai Lyrics Kaadhal Oviyam
stanzas:
Sangeetha Jaadhi mullai
Kaana villai
Kangal vandhum
Paavai indri paarvai illai

Raagangal indri
Sangeetham illai
Saavondruthaana
Nam kadhal ellai
En naadhame vaa..

Thirumugam vandhu pazhagumo
Arimugam seidhu vilagumo
Vizhigalil thuligal vadiyumo
Adhu suduvadhai thaanga mudiyumo

Kanavinil endhan uyiril
uravaagi vidigayil indru
Azhudhu pirivaagi
Thanimayil endhan idhayam
Sarugaagi udhirumo

Vizhigal azhudhapadi
Karangal thozhudha padi
Siraigalum podipada
Velivarum oru kizhi
Isai ennum mazhai varum
Ini endhan mayil varum

niyabaga vedhanai theerumo
Aadiya paathangal
Kadhalin Vedhangal
paadidumo Aadidumo
Paadidumo aadidumo
Aadidumo ....

Raja dheepame
Endhan vaasalile vaaraayo
Kuyile.. kuyile ..
kuyile .. Kuyile ..

Naan thaedi vandha
Kodai nilavu aval
neethaane neethaane
Mana kannil nindru
Pala kavidhai thandha
Magal neethaane neethaane
.
Vizhiyillai enumpodhu
Vazhi koduthai
Vizhi vandha pinnaal yaen ?
Siragodithaai (2)

Thaththi sellum
Muthu sirppam
Kannukulle kanneer vetpam
Innum enna nenjil acham
Kannil mattum jeevan micham

Mullai poovil mullum undo
Kandu kollum indha veshamenna
Raja deepame ...
